events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department for further consideration.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the process.
We completed the initial screening of your application and your profile looks promising for this engineering role.
Thank you for your prompt response and for providing additional details about your software development experience.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 16th at 10 AM to assess your engineering and coding skills.
